name: places/ChIJYSsWpZ_2wokRln0EKp4Pj8A
adrFormatAddress: 4126 Broadway, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: Standard laundry mat. The employees are always very kind and attentive. Gets busy, not many places to sit but it's around a bunch of other businesses and places to eat.

text.text: Standard laundry mat. The employees are always very kind and attentive. Gets busy, not many places to sit but it's around a bunch of other businesses and places to eat.

originalText.text:
Tried to do my laundry here in the evening a few months back. I decided to use two separate machines. The place was pretty empty, and I was loading my clothes into a second machine that was close to the first one I was using.

The guy working here took my detergent container — which was not empty and was right on top of the first machine with my clothes in it — and dumped it into the garbage. Never apologized or offered to replace it. When I asked him what happened to it, he rolled his eyes, shrugged, and told me to buy another one. I wasn't really looking forward to possibly having more of my things randomly tossed into the trash the instant I turned away from them, so I packed up my clothes and left.

originalText.text: The laundromat and the lady working there was nice. Place was clean and they had a small selection of laundry necessities for sale. Dryer cost were pricy to me, ¢25 for 7mins. I went there to only use the dryer and unfortunately their rules are you cant dry there if you didn't wash there. I've NEVER heard of that rule before but the lady was kind enough to let me dry my things there just that once.

originalText.text: Dry cleaning was supposed to be ready by Friday, they didn’t communicate that they would not be delivering and not responsive when I tried to figure out when we would receive our clothes back. If you need dry cleaning for a certain date I would not recommend using them and they are unreliable.

If you need dry cleaning for a certain date I would not recommend using them and they are unreliable.

originalText.text: Easily the best maintained and cleanest laundromat in the neighborhood - Jose and his team really know how to keep this place together well. There are a great variety of well sized for purpose machines, and generally a fantastic playlist going while there. On top of that, they go the coins oute, so you aren't stuck with yet anoher piece of plastic in your wallet.
